thread.title: Are you the mystery man? 'Gorgeous' woman's Facebook search to reunite with Brit from Ryanair flight
thread.title_full: Are you the mystery man? 'Gorgeous' woman's Facebook search to reunite with Brit from Ryanair flight

author: mirror
title: Are you the mystery man? 'Gorgeous' woman's Facebook search to reunite with Brit from Ryanair flight
text:
News Are you the mystery man? 'Gorgeous' woman's Facebook search to reunite with Brit from Ryanair flight The short flight from London to Dublin was just long enough for a man and a woman to make a lasting connection Share Did you mean Vera on the flight from London to Dublin? Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
A woman has launched a Facebook bid to reunite her 'gorgeous' friend with a man she met last week on a flight. 
The short Ryanair journey from London to Dublin was just long enough for them to make a lasting connection - but they parted at bagged claim. 
The woman, called Vera, was too shy to ask for the man's name and has now regretted it to this day. 
So Vera's friends have decided to play cupid and try to find the mystery man, who must have made such an impression on Vera that she has been sharing her story with them. 
"She would love to meet him again and she is gorgeous," Vera's friend Leonie said. 
Vera is from Germany and lives in Dublin , the Irish Mirror reports . 
After visiting a friend in London for New Year's she boarded a flight back to Ireland. Vera is searching for a man she met on a flight from London to Dublin 
She was on a Ryanair FR2371 from London Stansted to Dublin at 10.05am on Tuesday, 3rd January when she locked eyes with her mystery man in Row 9D. 
Leonie said the pair made eye contact several times during the flight before talking to each other at Passport Control. 
The only details Vera has from the conversation is that the man is British, lives in London and was visiting friends in Dublin for two days. 
She remembers him as dark blond, wearing a white shirt, grey jacket with a leather bag and he was about 5ft 11 in height. 
"Vera had to collect her bag from baggage claim and he said his friends were waiting for him to pick him up. 
"And that was it," Leonie said. 
"He hesitated a bit when Vera said she had to pick up her bag first and he said, 'Oh okay' and then she said have a nice stay." The Facebook message from Vera's thoughtful friend Leonie 
Leonie is calling out for anyone who was on that flight or remembers meeting Vera to contact her. 
If you were chatting to a 'nice blonde' on Ryanair FR2371 from London Stansted to Dublin on Tuesday 3rd January - there's a woman waiting for your call. Like us on Facebook
